tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Tooth Loss,Toothache,Teeth Sensitive to Hot and Cold,Dental Cavities,
review: A Smile-Transforming Experience: Exceptional Dentistry at Ashray Laser Dental by Dr. Shrey and Dr. Shamimdhi Dhawan.As someone who values dental health and a radiant smile, I recently had the pleasure of visiting Dr. Shrey Dhawan for Root canal, and I must say, it was nothing short of extraordinary.From the moment I stepped into the modern and inviting clinic, I was greeted and friendly staff who immediately put me at ease. The ambiance was calming, with soothing music playing in the background, setting the tone for a comfortable experience.My appointment began promptly, with the dentist taking the time to listen attentively to my concerns and thoroughly explain each step of the process. Their expertise and professionalism were evident as they conducted a comprehensive examination, using state-of-the-art equipment and techniques.What truly set Dr. Shrey and Dr. Kartik apart was their personalized approach to dental care. They tailored their recommendations to address my specific needs and goals, providing practical advice on maintaining optimal oral hygiene and suggesting tailored treatments to enhance the health and appearance of my smile.I had multiple appointments as there were 2 RCTs, 1 extraction and throughout each appointment, the dentist and their team displayed exceptional attention to detail and a genuine commitment to my satisfaction. Every aspect of the visit, from the gentle cleaning to the meticulous examination, was executed with precision and care, ensuring a comfortable and rewarding experience.In addition to their technical expertise, Dr. Shrey and Dr. Kartik, demonstrated a genuine passion for dentistry and a dedication to staying abreast of the latest advancements in the field.Overall, my experience at Ashray Laser dental exceeded all expectations. I wholeheartedly recommend Ashray green dental(Meera Bagh, Delhi) to anyone seeking top-notch dental care in a supportive and compassionate environment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have undergone root-canal surgery  from Dr. Shrey Dhawan. During my consultation, he very patiently explained the procedures that had to be done. The only issue that really concerned me was the pain associated with these treatments, but Dr. Shrey assured me that there would virtually be no pain at all. And contrary to popular belief, the root canal surgery  was almost painless. His team is brilliant and they take utmost care of you. I recommend this dental place to everyone in need of any dental procedure Dr.Shrey delivers a level of care and expertise that seldom coexists. He is a perfectionist who makes you feel more like a relative seating in his chair than simply another patient.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words :)

review:
Excellent work done by dr.shrey and team , I went to clinic because I had a cavity in my front upper teeth and both teeth were overlapping each other and dr.shrey sort it out at very reasonable price.


Thanks to Dr.shrey and his team.
